title: WHOIS Lookup
description: Look up domain registration details, registrar info, nameservers, and expiration dates via RDAP
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: domain_lookup
commands.description: Look up WHOIS/RDAP info for a domain name

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Domain name to look up (e.g. example.com)

returns.description: Domain registration details: registrar, status, nameservers, dates

commands.name: ip_lookup
commands.description: Look up network registration info for an IP address

returns.description: IP network info: CIDR, org name, country, registration dates
